the kids were thrilled to see her .
the games were fun for everyone .
the day ended with an easter egg hunt outside .
output.sentences: Today the community had an Easter party.
Some of the children were less than thrilled to visit with the Easter bunny.
There were many games, such as hop scotch.
There was also pin the tail on he rabbit.
The party concluded with an Easter egg hunt all all the children enjoyed searching for the candy-filled eggs.
